title: What the hell is a remake?!?!?!?!?!?!?!
body:
So my ranked game ended at 4mins in due to enemy surrender 2 to 1 and the verdict was "REMAKE"

WHAT THE ACTUAL HELL IS THIS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.body:
>[ If any player is dcâ€™d or flagged afk for at least 90 seconds at the three minute mark, a /remake is available](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/play-games-matter/remake)

Remake is basically an early surrender that means you don't have to play out a 4v5. The AFK/DC will have the game marked as a loss and lose LP for it (and will be flagged by leaverbuster), everyone else is unaffected (the game basically never happened for them).

basically if someone doesn't load into the game at the 5 minute mark I'm pretty sure it is u can do /remake and if u get majority vote the game ends with 0 lp lost to everyone except to the play who didn't connect
